value.value: flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-3 border-b border-[#3c3c3c]
absolute left-2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-4 h-4 text-[#858585]
flex flex-col items-center gap-3 px-5 py-10

node_type.code:
searchQuery
                ? `No extensions found for "${searchQuery}"`
                : activeTab === 'installed'
                  ? 'No extensions installed. Browse the marketplace to discover extensions.'
                  : 'No extensions available.'

!loading && filteredExtensions.map((extension) => (
{extension.name}
{extension.author} • v{extension.version}
{extension.installed && ( toggleExtension(extension.id)} /> )}
{extension.description}
{renderRating(extension.rating)} • {formatDownloads(extension.downloads)} downloads • {extension.category}
{!extension.installed ? ( ) : ( <> )}
))

state_fields.reasoning: useState hook 'searchQuery' maps to actor state field
useState hook 'activeTab' maps to actor state field
useState hook 'extensions' maps to actor state field
useState hook 'loading' maps to actor state field

effects.reasoning: Deps [activeTab] → inline in handlers that change these

patterns.name: useState_to_state
patterns.description: Convert useState hook to actor state field

patterns.name: useEffect_deps
patterns.description: Convert useEffect with deps to inline in message handler
patterns.sigil:
// Inline in the message that changes count:
on Increment { self.count += 1; self.save(); }

patterns.name: jsx_to_builder
patterns.description: Convert JSX element to VNode builder

patterns.name: onClick_to_message
patterns.description: Convert onClick handler to message dispatch

ambiguities.question: Where should the effect with deps [activeTab] be placed?

options.label: Inline in handlers
options.description: Add effect logic to message handlers that change the dependencies

options.label: Separate message
options.description: Create a dedicated message for the effect logic
